players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and he killed him last night. I investigated Bob and found out his role."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and he killed him last night. I investigated Bob and found out his role."
You: "Let's verify Diana's claim. I will investigate her to see if she is telling the truth or not."
Diana: "I believe Charlie is innocent. I don't think Alice or Bob have enough evidence to accuse him of being the mafioso."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and he killed him last night. I investigated Bob and found out his role."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
